release.note: Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc

Added a copy of the "FindComboBox" to the search results pad. This uses the accelerator key :kbd:`Alt-Q`. I have found this convenient to use for quick searches. Hit :kbd:`Alt-q`, type search term and hit enter to find and then hit :kbd:`Escape` **twice** to return focus to the text editor.
Added a copy of the "FindComboBox" to the search Embeditor/Embed Editor toolbar!
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
`SearchPadExtras - Include [Find Next] button on embeditor toolbar <http://support.fushnisoft.com/clarionaddins/issues/52>`_
`Feature request #55 - SearchPadExtras - search only in filled embeds <http://support.fushnisoft.com/clarionaddins/issues/55>`_
The Find Next button on the embed editor/embeditor toolbar also uses the new search modes.
Clarion 7 is no longer supported as of this version!
Combo box now registers a new selection from the drop list correctly. This means you can select an item and immediately hit Find Next and it will actually work properly
Combo box now registers the search string on los of focus so if you TAB out of the control Find Next will work correctly
New toolbar icons instead of the built in ones.
Icons are now 24x24 to match the default toolbar size.
Checks in the options drop down are now scaled correctly when toolbars are at the default size
